New Records: Corey Seager hit the hardest-hit Fall Classic homer in the Statcast era, dating back to 2015, with a ball leaving his bat at 114.5 mph
Key Match Events: Corey Seager launched a two-run homer and made a slick defensive play in the eighth inning to start a crucial double play

Corey Seager started a clutch double play, sliding on his knees to field a hot smash from Ketel Marte before flipping to Marcus Semien at second, who threw to first
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Texas Rangers improved to 9-0 on the road this postseason
The Rangers used a three-run third to take the early advantage
Texas are 9-0 this postseason when scoring first
Others: Brandon Pfaadt had a 2.70 ERA through four October starts, despite a 5.72 ERA during the regular season
